offerAndAcceptance.acceptance: Partnership, Parent and ET hereby agree as follows.
offerAndAcceptance.meetingOfMinds: ET and Parent acknowledge that the Partnership is entering into the Merger Agreement in reliance on the representations, warranties, covenants and other agreements of ET.

consideration.description: No monetary consideration is explicitly mentioned, but mutual representations and warranties are acknowledged as consideration.

contract.intentionToCreateLegalRelations: Intending to be legally bound hereby.

certaintyOfTerms.subjectMatter: Support Agreement pertaining to a merger.
certaintyOfTerms.timeForPerformance: Automatic termination as of the Support Agreement Termination Date or as specified in the Merger Agreement.

contract.consent: Parties agree to various covenants and agreements.
contract.formAndFormalities: Must be in writing as specified.

durationAndTermination.duration: Effective from date of execution until the Support Agreement Termination Date or as specified.

contract.representationsAndWarranties: Representations made by ET regarding organization and authority.
contract.indemnification: Not explicitly stated but implied through mutual agreements.

disputeResolution.method: Injunction or equitable relief to prevent breaches.
disputeResolution.details: Exclusive jurisdiction of the Delaware Court of Chancery.

contract.severability: Invalid provisions do not invalidate the agreement as a whole.
contract.confidentiality: Not explicitly stated but implied by the nature of the agreement.

signature.declaration: By: Riverwalk Logistics, L.P. as general partner; signed by Bradley C. Barron, President and CEO.
By: Sunoco GP LLC as general partner; signed by Joseph Kim, President and CEO.
By: LE GP, LLC as general partner; signed by Dylan A. Bramhall, EVP & Group CFO.
